description: Handles incoming updates from Telegram for any configured bot. It processes messages, syncs user data, and logs interactions.

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Initializes the handler with a specific bot's configuration, database connection, and token.

parameters.name: botConfig
parameters.description: An array containing bot configuration, including the 'id'.

methods.name: handle
methods.description: The main entry point for processing an update. It syncs user data to the 'users' table, logs the message to the 'messages' table, updates the 'last_accessed_at' timestamp in the new 'bot_user' relationship table, and handles specific commands like /login.
